long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draggable Stopwatch is a versatile Chrome extension designed to enhance your time management and productivity. This user-friendly tool offers stopwatch functionalities in a draggable interface that can be positioned anywhere on your screen. With intuitive controls, customizable settings, and always-visible display, it's perfect for tracking work sessions, managing breaks, or timing presentations. The extension features keyboard shortcuts for quick control, cross-platform synchronization, and a clean, minimalist design that won't clutter your workspace. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone looking to optimize their time usage, Draggable Stopwatch provides a flexible and efficient solution right in your Chrome browser. Take control of your time and boost your productivity with this lightweight yet powerful timekeeping tool.
